meanings.definition: In a manner relating to a single gene or genetic factor.
meanings.sent1: The trait was inherited monogenically from the mother.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied how traits are passed down monogenically.
meanings.sent3: The gene skipped happily monogenically from one generation to the next.
meanings.sent4: The DNA replicated monogenically, like a lone traveler on a genetic highway.
meanings.sent5: The concept of monogenically inherited diseases was easy to understand.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the inheritance of a trait from a single parent.
meanings.sent1: The monogenically inherited trait was evident in the offspring.
meanings.sent2: The family tree showed a clear monogenically passed trait.
meanings.sent3: The trait was like a secret gift, monogenically given by a single parent.
meanings.sent4: The trait passed down monogenically was like a torch lighting the way.
meanings.sent5: The monogenically inherited trait stood out like a bright star in the sky.
